svg.title: UML Class Diagram of care actor and related concepts
svg.desc: An UML Class Diagram of the concept care actor and the concepts related to it.

rect.title: person or group of people that has its own functions with responsibilities, authorities and relationships to achieve its objectives

mandate (commission) based on a commitment and either an informed consent or an authorization by law, defining the rights and obligations of one care actor with regard to his involvement in care processes performed for a specific subject of care
official document issued by a care actor attesting health condition relating to a subject of care

mandate (commission) based on a commitment and either an informed consent or an authorization by law, defining the rights and obligations of one care actor with regard to his involvement in care processes performed for a specific subject of care
request sent out by a care actor to another care actor for specific care information needed for the provision of care to a subject of care
dynamic, personalized plan including identified needed eligible social care activity, health objectives and care goals, relating to one or more specified health needs in a care process

data repository containing exclusively electronic health record extracts, accessible for duly authorized care actors independent of their organizational affiliation and placed under the custody of a care actor
health condition observed by a care actor
resource provided for funding care delivery
coherent and interconnected series of care events over time
care initiated by a responsible care actor and thereafter delivered automatically by an automatic medical device
possible future or current health condition described by a care actor
activity intended to improve or maintain a health state
defined association between care circumstances as determined by one or more care actors
circumstance contributing to the health state of a person
health record extract conveying specifically focused care information in order to fulfil current information needs of the recipient
request for care provider activities expressed by a care actor
set of systematically developed statements to assist the decisions made by care actors about care activities to be performed with regard to specified health circumstances
organization or person participating in care
care actor other than a care provider or the subject of care
care actor that is able to be assigned one or more care period mandates
person employed by a care organisation
person seeking to receive, receiving, or having received care
